Coronation Street actress Lucy Fallon has thanked viewers for their reaction to character Bethany's storyline in the soap which has seen her groomed by an older man. 
In Friday night's episode of the soap , Bethany lost her virginity to vile Nathan Curtis in one of the darkest storylines Corrie has ever tackled. 
“Thank you so much for all the lovely tweets about last nights episode. Such an important issue and I’m really humbled by the response X," Lucy tweeted on Saturday. Lucy Fallon was humbled by the response (Photo: ITV) Bethany with Nathan (Christopher Harper) (Photo: ITV) Nathan preys on Bethany and it all came to a head on Friday (Photo: ITV) 
Viewers praised Coronation Street and Bethany for its treatment of the harrowing storyline, and thanked the show for its handling of the issue. 
"It's a shocking storyline, but one that needs to be put out there, as too many teens are falling prey to this sort of thing," wrote one Twitter user. 
"It's tough to watch but it's important the issue is being addressed as it's real & does happen, you're doing amazingly so proud," tweeted another. 
Two episodes on Friday saw the storyline come to a head, when Bethany, having been plied with booze by Mel, was taken back to Nathan's house and ended up in his bed, where he took advantage. Bethany gets groomed by Nathan, who's much older (Photo: ITV) Bethany insisted on being taken home by Nathan in Friday night's episode (Photo: ITV) Read More Coronation Street star reveals he met with sex abuse victims to research role as child groomer 
Bethany ended up sleeping with Nathan before he was seen on the phone telling someone "It worked like a dream...remember what I said - this girl is special." 
Actress Lucy Fallon, who plays Bethany, warned it will be "uncomfortable viewing" as Nathan's real intentions become clearer.
